description: Demolition of existing house and garage and erection of two three storey buildings providing a total of sixteen flats one x 1 bedroom unit, one x 3 bedroom unit and fourteen 2 bedroom units with associated access and parking (Revised Submission)
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of the siting, scale and design of the buildings is considered to be detrimental to the street scene and the setting of the adjoining park contrary to the Council's adopted UDP policies B1, H26, H27 and OL10; Replacement UDP policies 3.4, 4.1, 4.5 and 5.5. | The proposal fails to make provision for affordable housing, and therefore is in breach of policy 5.2 of the Unitary Development Plan (First Deposit 01/02/02). | The proposed development would be likely to give rise to conditions prejudicial to pedestrian and highway safety as a result of the form of arrangements made for parking and access contrary to the Council's adopted UDP policies T62, T63; Replacement UDP policies 9.1 and 9.11. | The proposal is likely to have an adverse effect on a number of existing trees, the loss of which would be harmful to the character and appearance of the area contrary to the Council's adopted UDP policies B2, B16, ES4 and H27; Replacement UDP policies 4.5 and 5.5.
